REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2334 reute h f BC-C.O.M.B.-<CMCO>-MAKES 04-09 0046

TEXT.TITLE: C.O.M.B. <CMCO> MAKES ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: C.O.M.B. Co said it acquired for 8.7 mln dlrs the principal assets of National Tech Industries Inc and Telkon Corp. The companies are engaged in servicing, sales and telemarketing of consumer electronic merchandise. Reuter
